name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Releases Nuketown

details.description: This article talks about Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 devs Treyarch released Nuketown and how players love the remastered design.

name: Fortnite Reveals Ice Spice and Splits the Community

details.description: This article talks about when Fortnite revealed celebrities such as Ice Spice, Snoop Dogg, and Eminem and how're they taking over point-of-interest's instead of the og chapter 2 versions.
